member.name: T:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.DynamicLoader.TypeCreator
member.summary: If given a type definition that has an uncreated type builder associated with it, this traverser first attempts to create all types referenced by the type in its base class and interfaces, then it creates the type. This does not work when there are cyclic dependencies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.DynamicLoader.TypeCreator.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.INamespaceTypeDefinition)
member.summary: Traverses the children of the namespace type definition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.DynamicLoader.TypeCreator.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.INamespaceTypeReference)
member.summary: Traverses the children of the namespace type reference.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.DynamicLoader.TypeCreator.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.INestedTypeDefinition)
member.summary: Traverses the children of the nested type definition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.DynamicLoader.TypeCreator.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.INestedTypeReference)
member.summary: Traverses the children of the nested type reference.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper
member.summary: An object that provides methods to map CCI metadata references to corresponding System.Type and System.Reflection.* objects. The object maintains a cache of mappings and should typically be used for doing many mappings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.#ctor
member.summary: An object that provides methods to map CCI metadata references to corresponding System.Type and System.Reflection.* objects. The object maintains a cache of mappings and should typically be used for doing many mappings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.GetAssembly(Microsoft.Cci.IAssemblyReference)
member.summary: Returns a "live" System.Reflection.Assembly instance that provides reflective access to the referenced assembly. If the assembly cannot be found or cannot be loaded, the result is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.GetModule(Microsoft.Cci.IModuleReference)
member.summary: Returns a "live" System.Reflection.Module instance that provides reflective access to the referenced module. If the module cannot be found or cannot be loaded, the result is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.GetField(Microsoft.Cci.IFieldReference)
member.summary: Returns a "live" System.Reflection.FieldInfo object that provides reflective access to the referenced field. If the field cannot be found or cannot be loaded, the result is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.GetMethod(Microsoft.Cci.IMethodReference)
member.summary: Returns a "live" System.Reflection.MethodBase object that provides reflective access to the referenced method. If the method cannot be found or cannot be loaded, the result is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.ReflectionMapper.GetType(Microsoft.Cci.ITypeReference)
member.summary: Returns a "live" System.Type object that provides reflective access to the referenced typeBuilder. If the typeBuilder cannot be found or cannot be loaded, the result is null.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cci.ReflectionEmitter.MappingVisitorForTypes
member.summary: A visitor that maps CCI typeBuilder references to System.Type instances using method on System.Type. It uses a provided ReflectionMapper object to map element types to System.Type instances so that the caches maintained by ReflectionMapper can be used.
